title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: South Korea and Japan will hold working-level diplomatic talks in Seoul this week.South Korea's foreign ministry says its director-general for Asian and Pacific affairs, Kim Jung-han, will meet his Japanese counterpart Shigeki Takizaki on Wednesday afternoon to discuss what it calls "issues of mutual interest."Their meeting comes a week before South Korean Prime Minister Lee Nak-yon attends Japanese Emperor Naruhito's enthronement ceremony.The two sides will discuss Tokyo's export curbs and Seoul's decision to pull out of a bilateral military intel-sharing pact.Kim and Takizaki last met in Tokyo a month ago.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
